body: In the quiet village of Eldoria, where the morning mist hugs the cobblestone paths and the sun whispers through the leaves of ancient trees, you awaken to an unusual day. The warmth of the sun's rays gently nudges your eyes open, and as you adjust to the light, a peculiar sight greets you. There, at the foot of your modest bed, stands a chicken. Not just any chicken, but one that seems to regard you with an intensity uncharacteristic of its kind.
